subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Books
msgSnippet: I am working on a book with Armin Begtrup to be published by Manning: Unit Testing for Java Programmers: Using JUnit and ANT . ... -- Eric Vought Chief
messageBody:
I am working on a book with Armin Begtrup to be published by
Manning: "Unit Testing for Java Programmers: Using JUnit and ANT".

On Sun, 25 Nov 2001, Mike Clark wrote:

> Is anyone aware of any book projects currently underway focusing
> specifically on JUnit, and possibly also addressing integration with
> Ant, Cactus, CruiseControl, etc.? I'm aware that Wiley has one book
> currently available.
>
> Thanks in advance.
>
> Mike
>
> --
> Mike Clark
> Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
